name: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions
desc: Option flags used with beginActivity(options:reason:) and performActivity(options:reason:using:).

items.name: static var idleDisplaySleepDisabled: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions
items.desc: Flag to require the screen to stay powered on.

items.name: static var userInitiated: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions
items.desc: Flag to indicate the app is performing a user-requested action.

items.name: static var userInitiatedAllowingIdleSystemSleep: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions
items.desc: Flag to indicate the app is performing a user-requested action, but that the system can sleep on idle.

items.name: static var background: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions
items.desc: Flag to indicate the app has initiated some kind of work, but not as the direct result of user request.

items.name: static var latencyCritical: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions
items.desc: Flag to indicate the activity requires the highest amount of timer and I/O precision available.
